template: Hello **FIRSTNAME** and welcome to **COMPANY**. We hope you enjoy your stay in **CITY**. Room **ROOM** will be sanitized before you arrive for your stay from **STARTDAY**-**ENDDAY**. Thanks again **FIRSTNAME**!
Good **TIME** **FIRSTNAME**! We are looking forward to serving you at **COMPANY**. Feel free to visit our front desk to learn more about the exciting things to do in **CITY**.

**FIRSTNAME** **LASTNAME**, here at **COMPANY** we always put our customers first. If there is any part of your stay with us that does live up to your satisfaction, let us know and we will make it right!
As the oldest hotel service in **CITY**, **COMPANY** is looking forward to making your stay in **CITY** the best it can possibly be. Have a great **TIME**.
On a rainy **TIME**, there is still plenty to do at **COMPANY**. Try our 24/7 gym, pool, and sauna!
